item.title: Pressing started
item.description: The pressing of my new 12 inch vinyl record start started. Visit my Instagram to see a video.

item.title: Long Range Fire | Acid Techno
item.description: A acid techno song is done. Available on Social media, Youtube and Soundcloud.

item.author: news@markuszeller.com (Markus Zeller)
item.title: Revision 2025 Party Submissions
item.description: This easter weekend the Revision 2025 party takes place! I have submitted two entries - one for streaming music and another for modern graphics.
